name: Cute SS
description:
Take your little critter through a single level, avoiding the pitfalls and defeating any enemies that stand in your way!  This project is pretty polished compared to my usual game jam games, but has a few kinks to work out.  The background music was something I had on-hand and the sound effects are from an asset pack. Everything else was made by me during the Make-A-Level (Leap Day 2020) game jam period.

There's an uncommon bug associated somehow with the throw mechanic that will rarely lock the movement controls. It's not incredibly likely to occur, but if it does, you can restart the game via the pause menu (pres Enter).
